data.question: What is the empirical formula of UiO-68-azo?
What triggers the on-command cargo release in the mechanized MOF?
data.answer: Ultraviolet irradiation or addition of competitive agents

data.question: Is the crystal structure of UiO-68-azo retained after UV irradiation?
What is the role of b-cyclodextrin in the mechanized MOF?
data.answer: It acts as a gatekeeper to seal the nanopores and stop the release of the cargo.

data.question: How is the stability of UiO-68-azo in a buffer solution tested?
data.answer: By measuring the UV-visible spectra of the solution containing UiO-68-azo over time.

data.question: Does the addition of D-arabinose trigger the release of RhB from the mechanized MOF?
What is the formula weight of UiO-68-azo?
What happens to the b-CD rings upon UV irradiation of the mechanized MOF?
data.answer: The b-CD rings dissociate from the azobenzene stalks, opening the gates to the nanopores.

data.question: Is the synthesis of ligand 1 necessary for the construction of UiO-68-azo?
What method is used to calculate the BET surface area of UiO-68-azo?
data.answer: The adsorption data from nitrogen sorption measurement at 77 K.

data.question: What is the effect of adding amantadine to the mechanized MOF?
data.answer: It triggers the release of RhB by causing the dissociation of b-CD rings from the azobenzene stalks.

data.question: Can the mechanized MOF spontaneously release RhB without any external stimuli?
What is the crystal system of UiO-68-azo?
How does the addition of ethanol affect the release of RhB from the mechanized MOF?
data.answer: It shows a negligible amount of RhB released.

data.question: Is the ligand 1 capable of undergoing trans-to-cis isomerization under UV light?
What is the role of acetic acid in the synthesis of UiO-68-azo?
data.answer: It is used as a solvent in the reaction mixture.

data.question: What happens to the mechanized MOF after the addition of DMSO?
data.answer: A negligible amount of RhB is released.

data.question: Does the PXRD pattern of UiO-68-azo change significantly after cargo release?
What is the temperature used for the synthesis of UiO-68-azo?
What is the significance of the nitrogen adsorption and desorption isotherms of UiO-68-azo?
data.answer: They confirm its permanently porous nature and high surface area.
